text: Te, kotoryye pridut v Sudnyy den' s durnymi deyaniyami - neveruyushchiye i ne poklonyayushchiyesya Allakhu mnogobozhniki, - kotoryye oni sovershili v blizhayshey zhizni i umerli, sovershiv eti velikiye grekhi, budut povergnuty v ogon' i budet im skazano s uprokom: "Vam vozdayotsya segodnya za vashe mnogobozhiye i nepovinoveniye
